The State of AI March 2025

Organizations are beginning to create structures and processes that lead to meaningful value from gen AI, redesigning workflows, elevating governance, and mitigating risks. Companies with at least $500 million in annual revenue are changing more quickly than smaller organizations. The use of AI continues to build momentum, with over three-quarters of respondents using AI in at least one business function.

Key Concepts:

  • Organizational changes for gen AI
  • Capturing value from gen AI
  • Mitigating risks of gen AI
  • Redesigning workflows with gen AI
  • Generative AI
  • Wholesale transformative change
  • Competitive advantage
  • Business model disruption
AI gen AI organizations value workflows governance risks gen-AI AI risks cybersecurity
